org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler

Interface MetricsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMetricsServiceImpl

    public interface MetricsService
    Adapter of a service to store metrics
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    afarre

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default String buildMetricName(String _name, Object... _placeholders)
      Builds a metric name replacing the _name with the giving _placeholders the replacement follows the order of the arguments replacing the string "{}"
      void clear()
      Removes all current metrics in the service
      Optional<MetricSnapshot> getMetric(String _name, Object... _placeholders)
      Retrieve the metric snapshot with the given _name and _placeholders
      List<MetricSnapshot> getMetrics()
      Return an ordered list by name of the existent snapshot metrics
      int getSamplingSize()
      Retrieve the current sampling size for this metric service
      <TYPE> void registerMeasure(String _name, LocalDateTime _time, TYPE _measure, MeasureReducer<TYPE> _reducer, Object... _placeholders)
      Register a new measure into the metric with the given _name replaced with _placeholders and the given _reducer

    • Method Detail

      • buildMetricName

        default String buildMetricName(String _name,
                               Object... _placeholders)
        Builds a metric name replacing the _name with the giving _placeholders the replacement follows the order of the arguments replacing the string "{}"
        Parameters:
        _name - name where to replace the values
        _placeholders - replacement values
        Returns:
        the _name with the {} replaced by _placeholders
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null

      • getSamplingSize

        int getSamplingSize()
        Retrieve the current sampling size for this metric service
        Returns:
        the size of the samples allowed, -1 implies has no limit

      • getMetric

        Optional<MetricSnapshot> getMetric(String _name,
                                   Object... _placeholders)
        Retrieve the metric snapshot with the given _name and _placeholders
        Parameters:
        _name - metric name where to replace the values
        _placeholders - metric name replacement values
        Returns:
        an Optional with the metric snaphot if no metric exist return an empty optional
        See Also:
        buildMetricName(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...), MetricSnapshot

      • registerMeasure

        <TYPE> void registerMeasure(String _name,
                            LocalDateTime _time,
                            TYPE _measure,
                            MeasureReducer<TYPE> _reducer,
                            Object... _placeholders)
        Register a new measure into the metric with the given _name replaced with _placeholders and the given _reducer
        Type Parameters:
        TYPE - Type of the measure
        Parameters:
        _name - metric name where to replace the values
        _time - Local date time when measure was taken
        _measure - measure value
        _reducer - reducer for this type of measure
        _placeholders - metric name replacement values
        Throws:
        IncorrectMeasureType - if the metric already exist with another TYPE
        See Also:
        buildMetricName(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...), IncorrectMeasureType, LocalDateTime

      • getMetrics

        List<MetricSnapshot> getMetrics()
        Return an ordered list by name of the existent snapshot metrics
        Returns:
        List of metrics snapshot
        See Also:
        MetricSnapshot

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all current metrics in the service
